SHA256Hash - Class in database
Implementation of the abstract Hash class, using the SHA-256 Algorithm (of the SHA-2 family) It alternates between appending and prepending the salt, over many iterations in order to increase difficulty in brute-forcing the password.
SHA256Hash() - Constructor for class database.SHA256Hash
Constructor which gets the data to be encoded.
SQLiteInterface - Class in database
Important class which queries the database for login, map, and statistics.
SQLiteInterface(String) - Constructor for class database.SQLiteInterface
Opens a database connection with hashing.
start(Stage) - Method in class lightracer.LightRacer
Sets the background image and loads the login screen.
startRound() - Method in class database.GameInfo
Loads each round of the game and sets starting position and direction.
supportList - Variable in class database.DatabaseInterface
The support List contains strings stating what features an Implementation supports.
supports(String) - Method in class database.DatabaseInterface
Checks if the implementation supports a given feature.
